import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import AddExpense from "./popups/addExpense"; import SettleUp from "./popups/settleUp"; import "../../styles/dashboard.css"; export default function MiddleDashboard({ externalShowAdd, externalShowSettle, onCloseAdd, onCloseSettle, onOpenAdd, onOpenSettle, }) { const [showAdd, setShowAdd] = useState(false); const [showSettle, setShowSettle] = useState(false); // sync with header quick-actions useEffect(() => setShowAdd(!!externalShowAdd), [externalShowAdd]); useEffect(() => setShowSettle(!!externalShowSettle), [externalShowSettle]); const openAdd = () => { setShowAdd(true); onOpenAdd && onOpenAdd(); }; const openSettle = () => { setShowSettle(true); onOpenSettle && onOpenSettle(); }; const closeAdd = () => { setShowAdd(false); onCloseAdd && onCloseAdd(); }; const closeSettle = () => { setShowSettle(false); onCloseSettle && onCloseSettle(); }; return (
